creditline: The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund and gift of the Souls Grown Deep Foundation from the William S. Arnett Collection
description: cross-shaped; applied red cross with pink lines and pink, grey, and cream square spots; blue-grey ground with pink and red birds, one at top center and one at each end of horizontal arm of cross; pinkish-cream standing figure with pigeon toes and small three-feathered wings, with arms upraised, at bottom center
image_copyright: © Mose Tolliver %2F Artists Rights Society %28ARS%29%2C New York
signed: on left arm of cross in black: MOSE T | bottom left in black: MOS / E / T | verso in black marker: CROSS OF A / WHITE JESUS / WHITE A FRENCH / BIRD, A MOUNTAIN / BIRD AND A / PINTO BIRD
title: Cross of a White Jesus with a French Bird, a Mountain Bird, and Pinto Bird
